shapes3d.animation
Class ShapeMover

java.lang.Object
  shapes3d.animation.AbstractVectorChangeAction
      shapes3d.animation.ShapeMover

public class ShapeMover
extends AbstractVectorChangeAction

Class to cause a shape to move from one position to another over a fixed time period and after an optional delay start time.

Author:
Peter Lager

Constructor Summary

          Create and initialise the auto mover.
